heta (26) pallekale krikat kridanganaye di aarambha wimata niyamitha won – murali kusalanaya wenuwen pawathwena shri lanka – oostreliya test krikat tharagawaliye palamu tharangayata pera dalada samindunge aashirwada labaganima sandaha shri lanka kandayame kridakayin siyaludenama pahe eeye paswaruwe mahanuwara dalada maligawa wetha pamini dalada samindun wanda puda anathuruwa madhya hamuwedi shri lanka krikat sabhapathi thilanga sumathipala mahatha muralidaran ta chodana kalaya.
